title: Move a Post
content:
Hi all,

Do you know if it's possible to move a post from one category to another?

Actually my post is in the release category, but I have no longer released the display font, so now I want to create a new post for the font in the Display section to get opinions, critics and suggestions of all the users.

Thank you.  
Best Regards.
author: LevLev

comments.content:
Please email me the URL of the post you want moved, and indicate in this email where you would like it to be moved.

[typographer@gmail.com](mailto:typographer@gmail.com)
